meta.title: Health Tools - Useful Health and Wellness Utilities
meta.description: Collection of useful health and wellness tools to help you monitor and improve your wellbeing.
meta.keywords: health tools,health calculator,wellness tools,bmi calculator,calorie counter,health tracker

title: Health Tools
description: Useful health and wellness tools to help you monitor and improve your wellbeing

bmiCalculator.title: BMI Calculator
bmiCalculator.description: Calculate your Body Mass Index based on height and weight

calorieCounter.title: Calorie Counter
calorieCounter.description: Track your daily caloric intake with our simple calculator

heartRateZones.title: Heart Rate Zones
heartRateZones.description: Calculate your target heart rate zones for effective workouts

waterIntakeCalculator.title: Water Intake Calculator
waterIntakeCalculator.description: Determine how much water you should drink daily based on your body type

sleepCalculator.title: Sleep Calculator
sleepCalculator.description: Find the optimal bedtime based on when you need to wake up

stressLevelTest.title: Stress Level Test
stressLevelTest.description: Quick assessment to determine your current stress levels
